meanings.sent1: The befringed curtains added a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent2: She wore a befringed shawl to the party.
meanings.sent3: The befringed pillow looked like a fancy dancer at a party.
meanings.sent4: The befringed edges of the carpet danced in the breeze.
meanings.sent5: The befringed dress shimmered under the lights.

meanings.definition: Surrounded or bordered by a fringe.
meanings.sent1: The befringed mirror reflected the entire room.
meanings.sent2: The befringed stage was set for the performance.
meanings.sent3: The befringed lampshade looked like it was wearing a fancy skirt.
meanings.sent4: The befringed border of the painting added a unique touch.
meanings.sent5: The befringed doorway welcomed guests with a touch of style.
